message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a fantastic opportunity to purchase my product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $950,000. I believe this is a fair starting point for negotiations.

I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm looking to save some money on this purchase. I'm willing to pay $850,000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me is $1,000,000.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a deal. While your offer is tempting, the true value of this product is significant. I'm willing to come down to $900,000. This reflects the product's worth while acknowledging your interest.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $875,000 for the product. I think this is a reasonable price considering the value I place on it.
